snippet.title: Stilstand - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Stilstand is out now on Steam, iOS and Google Play. Stilstand is a dark and absurd interactive graphic novel about a young woman trying to make it through a hot summer in Copenhagen

Steam link: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1282320/Stilstand/

App Store link: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/id1512744695

Google Play link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.niila.stilstand

Navigate through a darkly comedic world of grotesque scenarios and richly detailed black and white illustrations. Play original mini-games, scroll fictive social media feeds and send bewildered text messages.

Press kit: http://niila.io/stilstand/presskit/ 

Production company: Heartbeats
Editing: David Rohde Hennings
Sound design: Andreas Lagerstedt
